They've subbed some of my favourite BL series, such as Junjou Romantica and Sekaiichi Hatsukoi. I really like how they add explanations for cultural concepts that western viewers might not be equipped with the knowledge of the Japanese culture and languag
Because they're Aarinfantasy. Need I say more?
finally subbed ep 2, no one else has
Bad Comments: The raw source they used wasn't all that great, but the solid translation and editing makes up for that.

Good Comments: good picture quality and subs
Good English; from what little Japanese I know, seems pretty accurate. :)
I've seen a lot of their work, and I haven't seen any mistakes or typos :)
I've watched a lot of animes that have been subbed by them, their pretty good
Bad Comments: Aarinfantasy is one of the best fansub groups. Their subs are just perfect. No grammar, punctuation or spelling mistakes, easy to understand yet English on quite high level. Plus all the needed explaination for non-Japanese people.
'tis always high-quality, legible and grammatically correct. They seem to conform to excellent standards and cater to the more obscure genres beautifully.
Quite good.

Good Comments: Very clean subbing and easy download!
They never fail to deliver excellent subs.
Because they always make their subs flow--they're very much in conversational dialogue.  Also, there are rarely spelling or grammatical errors in their subs.
Very clear
Bad Comments: they are always doing the subs for all BL related animes :D
Because they rock
Quality work and fast subbing.

Good Comments: Because they're Aarinfantasy. They ALWAYS put forth amazing quality subs, AND with explanations about certain things English speakers might not understand. Their subs are not only a way to understand what's going on, but also to learn the Japanese languag
